issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add FastHash32 as a 32-bit version of a scalar hash function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16945](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16945). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a subtask of ARROW-8991 in order to track that this is a 32-bit version of the scalar_hash function. ARROW-8991 can be treated as an overall task to track if we want other versions of the function or additional kernels and options.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16945?focusedCommentId=17574063) by Aldrin Montana (octalene):*
going to close this sub-task, as I've already scope creeped past just a 32-bit version.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16945?focusedCommentId=17574064) by Aldrin Montana (octalene):*
choosing "done" because it is not useful anymore but it is not quite "invalid"
